member.name: M:FilmSearch_BE.Controllers.FilmSearchController.FullFilmData(System.String)

member.returns: Returns full film data or an error

member.name: M:FilmSearch_BE.Controllers.FilmSearchController.Search(FilmSearchClasses.Dtos.SearchParams.SearchParam[],System.Nullable{System.Int32})
